trans-unit.source: Represents a date selection range in a month calendar control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un intervallo di selezione di data in un controllo calendario mensile.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> is the date or dates selected and highlighted on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> è la data o le date selezionate ed evidenziate sul <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controllo.

trans-unit.source: If only one date is selected, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values will be equal.
trans-unit.target: Se è selezionata una data, solo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> i valori delle proprietà sarà uguali.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> can be changed by the user clicking a date while dragging the mouse pointer across the desired dates, or you can set the range in code.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> può essere modificato dall'utente facendo clic su una data mentre si trascina il puntatore del mouse sopra le date desiderate, oppure è possibile impostare l'intervallo nel codice.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to have the user enter a date range into two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls or two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> controls and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> based on those dates.
trans-unit.target: Potrebbe ad esempio, si desidera che l'utente debba immettere un intervallo di date in due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controlli o due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> controlli e impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> in base a tali date.

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control based on two dates entered into two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> proprietà di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controllo basato su due date immesse in due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controlla se un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> si fa clic.

trans-unit.source: This code assumes new instances of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control, two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> have been created on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Questo codice si presuppone che le nuove istanze di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controllare due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controlli e un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> siano stati creati in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: You might consider adding code to validate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> assigned to the text boxes to verify that they contain valid dates.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere codice per convalidare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> assegnato alle caselle di testo per verificare che contengano le date valide.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> values are set to `null` when this constructor is used.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> valori vengono impostati su `null` quando questo costruttore viene utilizzato.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object, sets its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> properties, and assigns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creato un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> oggetto, il set relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> proprietà e assegna il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> dell'oggetto per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controllo.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> event is raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values are displayed in the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> viene generato l'evento, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> i valori delle proprietà vengono visualizzati nelle caselle di testo.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio si presuppone un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> con due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controlli, un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>e un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The existing <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> esistente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> class with the specified selection range.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> con l'intervallo di selezione specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values are assigned the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values of the assigned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> vengono assegnati i valori delle proprietà di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> i valori delle proprietà dell'oggetto assegnato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object, sets its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> properties, and assigns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creato un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> oggetto, il set relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> proprietà e assegna il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> dell'oggetto per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controllo.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> event is raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values are displayed in the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> viene generato l'evento, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> i valori delle proprietà vengono visualizzati nelle caselle di testo.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio si presuppone un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> con due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controlli, un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>e un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The starting date in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.
trans-unit.target: La data iniziale nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.

trans-unit.source: The ending date in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.
trans-unit.target: La data finale nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> class with the specified beginning and ending dates.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> con la data iniziale e finale specificate.

trans-unit.source: If the `lower`<xref:System.DateTime> value is greater than the `upper`<xref:System.DateTime> value, the `lower` value will be assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property instead of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se il `lower` <xref:System.DateTime> valore è maggiore di `upper` <xref:System.DateTime> valore, il `lower` valore verrà assegnato al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> proprietà invece del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control based on two dates entered into two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> proprietà di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controllo basato su due date immesse in due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controlla se un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> si fa clic.

trans-unit.source: This code assumes new instances of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control, two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> have been created on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Questo codice si presuppone che le nuove istanze di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controllare due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controlli e un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> siano stati creati in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: You might consider adding code to validate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> assigned to the text boxes to verify that they contain valid dates.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere codice per convalidare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> assegnato alle caselle di testo per verificare che contengano le date valide.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ending date and time of the selection range.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la data e l'ora finali dell'intervallo di selezione.

trans-unit.source: The ending <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value of the range.
trans-unit.target: Il valore dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> finale dell'intervallo.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object, sets its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> properties, and assigns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creato un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> oggetto, il set relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> proprietà e assegna il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> dell'oggetto per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controllo.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> event is raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values are displayed in the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> viene generato l'evento, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> i valori delle proprietà vengono visualizzati nelle caselle di testo.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio si presuppone un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> con due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controlli, un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>e un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting date and time of the selection range.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la data e l'ora iniziale dell'intervallo di selezione.

trans-unit.source: The starting <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value of the range.
trans-unit.target: Il valore dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> iniziale dell'intervallo.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object, sets its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> properties, and assigns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creato un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> oggetto, il set relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> proprietà e assegna il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> dell'oggetto per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controllo.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> event is raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values are displayed in the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> viene generato l'evento, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> i valori delle proprietà vengono visualizzati nelle caselle di testo.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio si presuppone un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> con due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controlli, un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>e un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una stringa che rappresenta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" />.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.ToString%2A> method returns a string that includes the values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.ToString%2A> metodo restituisce una stringa che include i valori per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> proprietà.
